name: Descent of Greed
description:
OVERVIEW

Created during the span of a week-long game jam at 3to1 studios, Descent of Greed is a chilling story-based game created by a passionate team of twelve high school students!

Play as George O'Riley as he explores an abandoned cave trying to strike gold. However, beware as you may just get lost as your lantern slowly burns out leaving you alone in the dark.

Your feet might catch on rocks in the dark, try wiggling and moving around to get past the rocks and hard places. This mine is a maze so try not to get lost!....Believe me..it happens a lot. 

CONTROLS

WASD to move; Q and E to interact; mouse to look around

AVAILABLE ON

Windows (Mac version coming soon!)

WARNING 

This game includes flashing lights that could potentially trigger seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. 

Cave 1 has low frame rate, but once you get past it everything should be fine! (It is possible to play with really low frame rate as well just not easy).
